entries.base_electronic_component: This is an Electronic Component used as an ingredient for crafting larger and more complicated items.
entries.blaster_power_handler: This is the fuel converter and energy-pulse generator component for blaster-type ranged weapons.
entries.blaster_pistol_barrel: This is the barrel and muzzle component for a blaster-pistol-type ranged weapon.
entries.scope_weapon: This is an electro-optical targetting aid for a ranged weapon.
